Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.cold_storage_test.coldstorage_test

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_base import TestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.coldstorage_utils import ColdStorageUtils
from havoc.autoval.lib.host.system.system_config import SystemConfig
from havoc.lib.decorators import retry



[docs]class ColdStorage_Test(TestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(ColdStorage_Test, self).__init__()
        self.cycle_count = self.test_control["cycle_count"]
        self.write_control_file = self.test_control["write_control_file"]
        self.read_control_file = self.test_control["read_control_file"]
        self.test = self.test_control["test"]
        self.slots = self.test_control.get("slots", 36)
        self.hdd_type = self.test_control.get("type", 'SATA')
        self.maxhdd = self.test_control.get("maxhdd", 4)
        self.fw = self.test_control.get("fw", "exp-27.14.0.18")
        self.num_expanders = self.test_control.get("num_expanders", 6)
        self.interface_speed = self.test_control.get("interface_speed", "12.0 Gbit")
        self.controllers_number = self.test_control.get("controllers_number", 2)



[docs]    def setup(self):
        super(ColdStorage_Test, self).setup(inband_config_check=False)
        self.hostname = self.host.hostname
        out = self.host.run("hostname")
        self.validate_equal(self.hostname, out, "connected to host")
        self.validate_no_exception(self.host.run, ["hostname"], "connected to host")
        self.host.oob.ping()
        self.validate_no_exception(self.host.oob.ping, [],
                "ping %s" % (self.host.hostname))
        # Run bancsi
        ColdStorageUtils()._bancsi(self.host)

        # Powercycle the enclosure before starting the test
        self.run_powercycle_enclosure()

        # Clear phy errors
        ColdStorageUtils().clear_phy_errors(self.host)
        ColdStorageUtils().clear_adapter_errors(self.host)

        self.cfg_filter = self.get_cycle_config_filter()



[docs]    @retry(tries=3, sleep_seconds=60)
    def run_powercycle_enclosure(self):
        ColdStorageUtils().powercycle_enclosure(self.host)



[docs]    def execute(self):
        # Get config before test
        cfg1 = SystemConfig.config_check(self.host)
        self.validate_condition(cfg1, "Config check before test")

        # Check all expanders
        expander_list = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)
        expander_number = len(expander_list)
        self.validate_equal(expander_number, self.num_expanders, "number of Expanders")

        if self.test == "power_cycle":
            self.powercycle(expander_list)
        if self.test == "fio":
            self.run_coldstorage_fio(expander_list)
        if self.test == "drive_enumeration":
            self.drive_enumeration(expander_list)
        if self.test == "hba_enumeration":
            self.hba_enumeration(expander_list)
        if self.test == "drive_powercycle":
            self.drive_powercycle(expander_list)
        if self.test == "stability_powercycle":
            self.stability_powercycle(expander_list)
        if self.test == "fio_thermal":
            self.fio_thermal(expander_list)
        if self.test == "sert":
            self.sert(expander_list)
        if self.test == "performance_latency":
            self.performance_latency(expander_list)
        if self.test == "performance_data_transfer_rate":
            self.performance_data_transfer_rate(expander_list)
        if self.test == "error_handling":
            self.error_handling(expander_list)
        if self.test == "data_protection":
            self.data_protection(expander_list)

        # Get config after test
        cfg2 = SystemConfig.config_check(self.host)
        self.validate_condition(cfg2, "Config check after test")
        SystemConfig.compare_configs(cfg1, cfg2, user_filter=self.cfg_filter)



[docs]    def run_coldstorage_fio(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running Cold Storage FIO Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        expander_list = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Cold Storage FIO Test : Iteration %s" % j)
            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in the vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Run FIO write
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.write_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Restart all drives in the vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Run FIO read
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.read_control_file, timeout=26000)

                # Power-off all drives in the vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)



[docs]    def powercycle(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running HDD Power-on/off Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count

        # Get events
        events_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
            expander_list)

        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running HDD Power-on/off Test : Iteration %s" % j)
            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in the vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index,
                    expander_list)
                # Power-off all drives in the vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index,
                    expander_list)

            # Get events and compare
            events_after = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)
            diff = self.compare_configs(events_before, events_after)
            self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def stability_powercycle(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running Stability Powercycle Test.")

        # Clear inventory history
        ColdStorageUtils().clear_inventory_counter(self.host)

        # Set inventory counters
        start_inventory = 0
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        end_inventory = start_inventory + cycle_count

        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running Stability Powercycle Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Reboot and run csi
            ColdStorageUtils().powercycle(self.host, "reboot")
            #ColdStorageUtils()._bancsi(self.host)
            self.log_info("Collecting inventory data, please wait 15 min")
            ColdStorageUtils().inventory_run(self.host)

            # Check
            cont = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
            self.validate_equal(cont, self.controllers_number, "enumerated controllers")
            exp = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
            self.validate_equal(exp, self.num_expanders, "enumerated expanders")
            jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
            os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
            self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, os_hdd, "enumerated disks")

            # Check inventory counter
            current_inventory = ColdStorageUtils().get_inventory_counter(self.host)
            self.log_info("Current inventory is %s. Expected %s"
                % (current_inventory, end_inventory))
            start_inventory = start_inventory + 1
            self.validate_equal(start_inventory, current_inventory, "inventory counter")

            # Power-off last drive after inventory
            expander_list = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)
            for key in expander_list:
                ColdStorageUtils().call_fbjbod_power_command(False, self.slots - 1, key)

            # Check missing drives
            missing = ColdStorageUtils().inventory_missing(self.host, self.slots)
            self.validate_equal(missing, 0, "missing drives")



[docs]    def drive_powercycle(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running Drive Powercycle Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count

        # Get events
        events_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
            expander_list)

        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running Drive Powercycle Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Power-on all drives in Vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                expander_list = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                #Get number of disks
                exp_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)

                # Run write FIO
                self.log_info("Performing FIO sequential write to disks")
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.write_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Check 5 different ways to reboot server
                if index < 3:
                    # Reboot
                    ColdStorageUtils().powercycle(self.host, "reboot")
                    ColdStorageUtils()._bancsi(self.host)
                    # Check components
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.controllers_number, "controllers")
                    output = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(output, self.num_expanders, "expanders")
                    jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from JBOD")
                    hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from HBA")
                    os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(os_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from OS")

                elif index < 6:
                    # AC reboot
                    ColdStorageUtils().powercycle(self.host, "ac")
                    ColdStorageUtils()._bancsi(self.host)
                    # Check components
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.controllers_number, "controllers")
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.num_expanders, "expanders")
                    jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from JBOD")
                    hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from HBA")
                    os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(os_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from OS")

                elif index < 9:
                    # Reset
                    ColdStorageUtils().powercycle(self.host, "reset")
                    ColdStorageUtils()._bancsi(self.host)
                    # Check components
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.controllers_number, "controllers")
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.num_expanders, "expanders")
                    jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from JBOD")
                    hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from HBA")
                    os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(os_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from OS")

                elif index < 12:
                    # DC reboot
                    ColdStorageUtils().powercycle(self.host, "dc")
                    ColdStorageUtils()._bancsi(self.host)
                    # Check components
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.controllers_number, "controllers")
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.num_expanders, "expanders")
                    jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from JBOD")
                    hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from HBA")
                    os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(os_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from OS")

                else:
                    # Warm reboot
                    ColdStorageUtils().powercycle(self.host, "warm")
                    ColdStorageUtils()._bancsi(self.host)
                    # Check components
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.controllers_number, "controllers")
                    out = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(out, self.num_expanders, "expanders")
                    jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from JBOD")
                    hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from HBA")
                    os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                    self.validate_equal(os_hdd, exp_hdd, "disks from OS")

                # Run read FIO
                self.log_info("Performing FIO sequential read from disks")
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.read_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Check 2 different ways to make all drives off
                if (index % 2) != 0:
                    # Powercycle the enclosure
                    self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                else:
                    # Power-off all available drives
                    self.log_info("Powering-off all drives")
                    ColdStorageUtils().power_off_all(self.host)

                # Check drives
                os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(os_hdd, 0, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, 0, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, 0, "disks from JBOD")

            # Get events and compare
            events_after = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)
            diff = self.compare_configs(events_before, events_after)
            self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def hba_enumeration(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running HBA Enumeration Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running HBA Enumeration Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Power-on N drives in each expander at a time (max 4 supported)
            for i in range(5):
                self.log_info("Case %d: Powered-on %d hdd on expander" % (i, i))
                for key in expander_list:
                    for slot in range(0, i * 10, 10):
                        ColdStorageUtils().call_fbjbod_power_command(True, slot, key)

                # Check status of all disks
                os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(os_hdd, i * self.num_expanders, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, i * self.num_expanders, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, i * self.num_expanders, "disks from JBOD")

                # Powercycle all expanders
                self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                expander_list = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)

                # Check controllers
                out = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(out, self.controllers_number, "controllers")

                # Check expanders from OS, HBA and JBOD
                out = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(out, self.num_expanders, "expanders from OS")
                output = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_expanders(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(output, self.num_expanders, "expanders from HBA")
                exp = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(len(exp), self.num_expanders, "expanders from JBOD")

                # Check drives
                os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(os_hdd, 0, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, 0, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, 0, "disks from JBOD")

            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in the vslot
                self.log_info("Case %s: Powered-on vSlot %s" % (index + 5, index))
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Check status of all disks
                os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(os_hdd, jbod_hdd, "disks from OS")
                self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, hba_hdd, "disks from JBOD")

                # Powercycle all expanders
                self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                expander_list = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)

                # Check controllers
                out = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(out, self.controllers_number, "controllers")

                # Check expanders from OS, HBA and JBOD
                out = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_expanders(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(out, self.num_expanders, "expanders from OS")
                output = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_expanders(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(output, self.num_expanders, "expanders from HBA")
                exp = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(len(exp), self.num_expanders, "expanders from JBOD")

                # Check drives
                os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(os_hdd, 0, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, 0, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, 0, "disks from JBOD")



[docs]    def drive_enumeration(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running Drive Enumeration Test.")
        self.log_info("Running Drive Enumeration Test (baseline)")

        # Check max hdd on per expander
        ColdStorageUtils().check_max_hdd_on(self.host, expander_list, self.maxhdd)

        # Check expander FW version
        ColdStorageUtils().check_fw_version(self.host, expander_list, self.fw)

        # Disable write_cache on HBA
        self.log_info("Disabling write cache on HBA")
        ColdStorageUtils().disable_writecache_hba(self.host)

        # Disable write_cache on HDD
        for index in range(0, 15):
            self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
            ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)
            self.log_info("Disabling write cache on each HDD")
            ColdStorageUtils().disable_writecache_hdd()
            self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
            ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)

        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running Drive Enumeration Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Check all controllers
            contr = ColdStorageUtils().get_controllers(self.host)
            self.validate_equal(self.controllers_number, contr, "controllers")

            # Power-on one drive in each expander at a time
            for slot in range(1):
                self.log_info("Powering-on slot number %s" % slot)
                for key in expander_list:
                    ColdStorageUtils().call_fbjbod_power_command(True, slot, key)

                #Check hdd type
                self.log_info("HDD type checking")
                ColdStorageUtils().check_device_type(self.hdd_type)

                # Check smart data
                self.log_info("Smart data checking")
                ColdStorageUtils().get_smart_output(self.host)

                # Check write-read cache
                self.log_info("Read-write cache config checking")
                ColdStorageUtils().cache_config()

                # Check interface speed
                self.log_info("Interface speed checking")
                ColdStorageUtils().drive_interface_speed_check(self.interface_speed)

                # Check status of all disks
                self.log_info("Disks enumeration checking")
                os_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_os_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(os_hdd, self.num_expanders, "disks from OS")
                hba_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_hba_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(hba_hdd, self.num_expanders, "disks from HBA")
                jbod_hdd = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_hdds(self.host)
                self.validate_equal(jbod_hdd, self.num_expanders, "disks from JBOD")

                # Power-off one drive in each expander at a time
                self.log_info("Powering-off slot number %s" % slot)
                for key in expander_list:
                    ColdStorageUtils().call_fbjbod_power_command(False, slot, key)



[docs]    def fio_thermal(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running FIO Thermal Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running FIO Thermal Test : Iteration %s" % j)

            # Get initial expanders temperature
            self.log_info("Collect initial Expander temperature")
            dict_expanders_start = ColdStorageUtils().get_expanders_temp(
                self.host, expander_list)

            # Check initial expanders power consumption
            self.log_info("Collect initial Expander power consumption")
            dict_init_power = ColdStorageUtils().get_expanders_power(
                self.host, expander_list)

            # Power-on all drives in the vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Get initial HDD temperature
                self.log_info("Collect beginning HDD temperature")
                dict_hdds_start = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdds_temp(self.host)

                # Get beginning expander power consumption
                self.log_info("Collect beginning Expander power consumption")
                dict_start_power = ColdStorageUtils().get_expanders_power(
                    self.host, expander_list)

                # Check difference in power
                for key in dict_start_power:
                    self.validate_condition(
                        dict_start_power[key] != dict_init_power[key],
                        "Expander power changed in %s" % key, log_on_pass=False)

                # Run write FIO
                self.log_info("Performing FIO sequential write to disks")
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.write_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Run read FIO
                self.log_info("Performing FIO sequential read from disks")
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.read_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Get current Expander power consumption
                self.log_info("Collect current Expander power consumption")
                dict_current_power = ColdStorageUtils().get_expanders_power(
                    self.host, expander_list)

                # Get current temperature
                self.log_info("Collect current Expander temperature")
                dict_expanders = ColdStorageUtils().get_expanders_temp(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Collect current HDD temperature")
                dict_hdds = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdds_temp(self.host)

                # Check difference in power
                for key in dict_start_power:
                    self.validate_condition(
                        dict_current_power[key] != dict_init_power[key],
                        "Expander power changed in %s" % key, log_on_pass=False)

                # Check difference in Expander temperature
                for key in dict_expanders:
                    self.validate_condition(
                        dict_expanders_start[key] != dict_expanders[key],
                        "Expander temperature changed in %s" % key, log_on_pass=False)

                for key in dict_hdds:
                    self.validate_condition(
                        dict_hdds_start[key] != dict_hdds[key],
                        "HDD temperature changed in %s" % key, log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-off all drives in vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)



[docs]    def performance_data_transfer_rate(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running Performance Data Transfer Rate Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running Performance Test: Iteration %s" % j)

            # Counters
            min_bw_read = {}
            min_bw_write = {}
            min_iops_read = {}
            min_iops_write = {}
            max_lat_read = {}
            max_lat_write = {}

            for index in range(0, 15):
                # Power-on all drives in Vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Run fio
                # self.host.autotest.run("fio_fb_perf", "control_coldstorage",
                #                       timeout=26000)
                self.log_info("Running FIO: sequential write 10Mb")
                write_dict = ColdStorageUtils().sequential_write(self.host, "write")

                # Parse values
                min_bw_write[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["bw"], write_dict))
                min_iops_write[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["iops"], write_dict))
                max_lat_write[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: write_dict[a]["lat"], write_dict))

                # Run fio read
                self.log_info("Running FIO: sequential read 10Mb")
                read_dict = ColdStorageUtils().sequential_write(self.host, "read")

                # Parse values
                min_bw_read[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["bw"], read_dict))
                min_iops_read[index] = min(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["iops"], read_dict))
                max_lat_read[index] = max(
                    map(lambda a: read_dict[a]["lat"], read_dict))

                # Power-off all drives in Vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)

            # Consolidate resutls
            iops_read = min(min_iops_read.values())
            iops_write = min(min_iops_write.values())
            bw_read = min(min_bw_read.values())
            bw_write = min(min_bw_write.values())
            lat_read = max(max_lat_read.values())
            lat_write = max(max_lat_write.values())
            self.log_info(
                "Read: avg_bw=%f MiB/s, avg_iops=%f, avg_lat=%f ms"
                % (bw_read / 1024, iops_read, lat_read))
            self.log_info(
                "Write: avg_bw=%f MiB/s, avg_iops=%f, avg_lat=%f ms"
                % (bw_write / 1024, iops_write, lat_write))



[docs]    def performance_latency(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running Performance Latency Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running Performance Latency Test: Iteration %s" % j)

            # Counters
            max_read = {}
            max_write = {}

            # Power-on all drives in Vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Read latency
                self.log_info("Read latency by IOPING")
                read_dict = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_latency(self.host, False)
                read = max(read_dict.values())
                self.log_info("Read latency on vSlot %s is %f ms" % (index, read))
                max_read[index] = read

                # Read-write latency
                self.log_info("Read-write latency by IOPING")
                write_dict = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_latency(self.host, True)
                write = max(write_dict.values())
                self.log_info("Read-write latency on vSlot %s is %f ms"
                    % (index, write))
                max_write[index] = write

                # Power-on all drives in Vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)

            # Consolidate results
            read = max(max_read.values())
            write = max(max_write.values())
            self.log_info("Average read latency is %f ms" % read)
            self.log_info("Average read-write latency is %f ms" % write)



[docs]    def sert(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Running System Error Ratio Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Running System Error Ratio Test: Iteration %s" % j)

            # Get events
            events_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)

            # Power-on all drives in Vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Get error rate before write FIO
                self.log_info("Get JBOD errors before write FIO")
                jbod_init = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_errors(self.host, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Get HBA errors before write FIO")
                adapter_init = ColdStorageUtils().get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                self.log_info("Get HDD errors before write FIO")
                hdd_init = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Run write FIO
                self.log_info("Performing FIO random write to disks")
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.write_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Get error rate after write FIO
                self.log_info("Get JBOD errors after write FIO")
                jbod_write = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_errors(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Get HBA errors after write FIO")
                adapter_write = ColdStorageUtils().get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                self.log_info("Get HDD errors after write FIO")
                hdd_write = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check error difference
                self.log_info("Check JBOD errors difference")
                diff = self.compare_configs(jbod_init, jbod_write)
                self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                self.log_info("Check HBA errors difference")
                diff = self.compare_configs(adapter_init, adapter_write)
                self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)
                self.log_info("Check HDD errors difference")
                diff = self.compare_configs(hdd_init, hdd_write)
                self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HDD errors", log_on_pass=False)

                # Get value was written to HDD in Gb
                self.log_info("Get value written to HDD")
                Gb_dict = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_written(self.host)
                for key in Gb_dict:
                    value = Gb_dict[key]
                    self.validate_equal(value, 1, "Gb was written", log_on_pass=False)

                # Powercycle all expanders
                self.run_powercycle_enclosure()
                expander_list = ColdStorageUtils().getExpanderlist(self.host)

                # Some errors may appear after powercycle
                self.log_info("Get JBOD errors after powercycle")
                jbod_errors = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_errors(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Get HBA errors after powercycle")
                adapter_errors = ColdStorageUtils().get_adapter_errors(self.host)

                # Verify errors
                self.log_info("Checking JBOD errors")
                for key in jbod_errors:
                    err = jbod_errors[key]
                    #Acceptable 1 hdd error per expander
                    self.validate_condition(err <= self.maxhdd * (index + 1),
                        "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                self.log_info("Checking HBA errors")
                for key in adapter_errors:
                    err = adapter_errors[key]
                    #Acceptable 1 error per expander
                    self.validate_condition(err <= self.num_expanders * (index + 1),
                        "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-on all drives again
                self.log_info("Power-on Vslot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Get error rate before read FIO
                self.log_info("Get JBOD errors before read FIO")
                jbod_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_errors(
                    self.host, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Get HBA errors before read FIO")
                adapter_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                self.log_info("Get HDD errors before read FIO")
                hdd_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Run read FIO
                self.log_info("Performing FIO random read from disks")
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/coldstorage_read_test",
                    "%s" % self.read_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Get error rate after read FIO
                self.log_info("Get JBOD errors after read FIO")
                jbod_read = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_errors(self.host, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Get HBA errors after read FIO")
                adapter_read = ColdStorageUtils().get_adapter_errors(self.host)
                self.log_info("Get HDD errors after read FIO")
                hdd_read = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check difference
                self.log_info("Check JBOD errors difference")
                diff = self.compare_configs(jbod_before, jbod_read)
                self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                self.log_info("Check HBA errors difference")
                diff = self.compare_configs(adapter_before, adapter_read)
                self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)
                self.log_info("Check HDD errors difference")
                diff = self.compare_configs(hdd_before, hdd_read)
                self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "HDD errors", log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-off all drives
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)

                # Some errors may appear after power-off
                self.log_info("Get JBOD errors after power-off")
                jbod_read = ColdStorageUtils().get_jbod_errors(self.host, expander_list)
                self.log_info("Get HBA errors after power-off")
                adapter_read = ColdStorageUtils().get_adapter_errors(self.host)

                # Verify errors
                self.log_info("Checking JBOD errors")
                for key in jbod_errors:
                    err = jbod_errors[key]
                    #Acceptable 1 hdd error per expander
                    self.validate_condition(err <= self.maxhdd * (index + 1),
                        "JBOD errors", log_on_pass=False)
                self.log_info("Checking HBA errors")
                for key in adapter_errors:
                    err = adapter_errors[key]
                    # Acceptable 1 error per expander
                    self.validate_condition(err <= self.num_expanders * (index + 1),
                        "HBA errors", log_on_pass=False)

            # Get events and compare
            events_after = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)
            diff = self.compare_configs(events_before, events_after)
            self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def error_handling(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Error Handling Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Error Handling Test. Iteration %s" % j)

            # Get events
            events_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
                expander_list)

            # Power-on one drive in each expander at a time
            for slot in range(0, self.slots):
                for exp in expander_list:
                    ColdStorageUtils().call_fbjbod_power_command(True, slot, exp)

                # Check hdd status
                ColdStorageUtils().check_hdd_status()

                # Get initial hdd errors
                self.log_info("Get initial HDD errors")
                hdd_init = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Make the bad block (assume sector 32'000'000)
                self.log_info("Create a bad sector on each HDD")
                ColdStorageUtils().make_bad_sector(self.host, 320000)

                # Get hdd errors after test
                self.log_info("Get HDD errors after damage")
                hdd_before = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check difference
                self.log_info("Check difference")
                pattern_before = {
                    "Raw_Read_Error_Rate": 1,
                    "Seek_Error_Rate": 0,
                    "UDMA_CRC_Error_Count": 0,
                    "Current_Pending_Sector": 1}

                for key in hdd_before:
                    errors_init = hdd_init[key]
                    errors_before = hdd_before[key]
                    for key2 in pattern_before:
                        diff = errors_before[key2] - errors_init[key2]
                        self.validate_condition(diff == pattern_before[key2],
                            "%s = %d on disk %s" % (key2, errors_before[key2], key),
                            log_on_pass=False)

                # Repair the bad sector
                self.log_info("Repair bad sector on each HDD")
                ColdStorageUtils().repair_bad_sector(self.host, 320000)

                # Get hdd error after test
                self.log_info("Get HDD errors after repair")
                hdd_after = ColdStorageUtils().get_hdd_errors(self.host)

                # Check difference
                self.log_info("Check difference")
                pattern_after = {
                    "Raw_Read_Error_Rate": 1,
                    "Seek_Error_Rate": 0,
                    "UDMA_CRC_Error_Count": 0,
                    "Current_Pending_Sector": 0}

                for key in hdd_after:
                    errors_init = hdd_init[key]
                    errors_after = hdd_after[key]
                    for key2 in pattern_after:
                        diff = errors_after[key2] - errors_init[key2]
                        self.validate_condition(diff == pattern_after[key2],
                            "%s = %d on disk %s" % (key2, errors_after[key2], key),
                            log_on_pass=False)

                # Power-off one drive in each expander at a time
                for exp in expander_list:
                    ColdStorageUtils().call_fbjbod_power_command(False, slot, exp)

                # Get events and compare
                events_after = ColdStorageUtils().get_event_errors(self.host,
                    expander_list)
                diff = self.compare_configs(events_before, events_after)
                self.validate_empty_diff(diff, "events")



[docs]    def data_protection(self, expander_list):
        self.log_info("Data Protection Test.")
        cycle_count = self.cycle_count
        for j in range(1, cycle_count + 1):
            self.log_info("Data Protection Test. Iteration %s" % j)

            # Power-on all drives in Vslot
            for index in range(0, 15):
                self.log_info("Powering-on vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(True, index, expander_list)

                # Run write FIO
                self.log_info("Performing FIO test")
                self.host.autotest.run("storage/drive/drive_data_protection",
                    "%s" % self.write_control_file, timeout=260000)

                # Power-off all drives in Vslot
                self.log_info("Powering-off vSlot number %s" % index)
                ColdStorageUtils().virtual_slot_power_onoff(False, index, expander_list)



[docs]    def get_cycle_config_filter(self):
        cfg_filter = []
        cfg_filter.append({'filter_name': 'OpenbmcResetStress'})
        return cfg_filter



[docs]    def cleanup(self):
        super(ColdStorage_Test, self).cleanup(
            cfg_filter=["sensors"],
            inband_config_check=False
        )



[docs]def main():
    test = ColdStorage_Test()
    test.lifecycle()


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
